  <title>New York State Boundary</title>
  <abstract>Published: August 2022
A vector polygon GIS file of the New York State boundary. The file was originally a compilation of U.S. Geological Survey 1:100,000-scale digital vector files and NYS Department of Transportation 1:24,000-scale and 1:75,000-scale digital vector files. The boundary was revised to 1:24,000-scale positional accuracy.

New York State boundary. </abstract>
